description: A file-system based Go framework for APIs and websites, inspired by Next.js App Router
rules: Always use file-based routing under the app/ directory
Route handlers must be named after HTTP methods (Get, Post, Put, Delete, etc.)
Use fuego.Context for handling requests and responses
Middleware functions must accept and return fuego.HandlerFunc
Page templates must use templ syntax with the Page() component
Layout templates must accept children... parameter
Use fuego generate commands for scaffolding new routes, middleware, pages, and proxies
Always run golangci-lint before committing to avoid CI failures
For deferred operations, use: defer func() { _ = file.Close() }()
